title: Fix i18n Provider Error

requirements.text: Wrap the App component with I18nProvider in frontend/src/main.tsx to resolve the 'useI18n must be used within an I18nProvider' error

quotes: useI18n must be used within an I18nProvider

acceptanceCriteria: I18nProvider wraps the App component in the component tree
Application loads without i18n provider errors
Multi-language support (Turkish, English) continues to function correctly

requirements.text: Ensure I18nProvider is imported from frontend/src/i18n/I18nProvider.tsx in main.tsx
acceptanceCriteria: I18nProvider import statement is present and correct
No import errors occur during build or runtime

requirements.text: Verify that the component hierarchy in main.tsx correctly places I18nProvider between QueryClientProvider and App component
acceptanceCriteria: Provider hierarchy follows the pattern: QueryClientProvider > InternetIdentityProvider > I18nProvider > App
All child components can access i18n context without errors

constraints: Do not modify frontend/src/main.tsx structure beyond adding I18nProvider wrapper
Maintain the existing QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers
nonGoals: Adding new features beyond fixing the provider error
